then.line: I think this means you're not afraid of death. You live for the moment.
Interesting. That suggests I'm maybe reactive... instead of proactive.
Sure!
It could also mean that I'm a risk-taker. And that I should be bold, even in the face of impossible odds.
Okay!
Wow, Prota. This is really giving me a lot to think about.
Let's do the next card. If the STAR was my past and DEATH is my present, this is... the big one, right?
It's definitely something.
Okay... I'll choose this one. But I can't look. Tell me what I got.
It's...
The TOWER!
Whoa! Okay. What's it mean?
I think this card means that...this is a time of endings. And new beginnings.
Wow! Prota! Are you psychic?!
No, I'm just using the cards.
Yeah, but Prota! Think about it! Engings and new beginnings?
It's time to end my confusion! And begin the next stage of my life! Goodbye architecture, hello competitive eating!
But wait... What if it means ending my mozzarella daydreams... and begin getting serious about architecture?
Oh no. I guess there's only one way to find out.
I'd better draw the next card.
Good idea! That should tell me my future. What is it?
It's... the TOWER!
Interesting. Guess you should tell me what it means.
I guess I should.
I think it means you strive for immortaility. For your achievements to outlive you.
Huh! Wow. That's... really interesting.
But I'm not sure it's helpful.
What do you mean?
I mean, it could mean that I want to be in architecture, creating buildings that last for centuries...
But you know what lasts even longer than that?! Competitive eating records!
...Do they?
Uhhh, how about you ask Hogarth Panzanella, who ate no fewer than 3 plates of nachos in 1879?
What? Even I could eat three plates of nachos if you gave me a whole year.
He did it in TWO MINUTES. And his record has stood strong ever since!
Now come on! This next one is the biggie: my future. What card do I get?
You get... THE TOWER!
The TOWER? Tell me more, my tarot-reading friend.
